rows.label: qst000502_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you so much!
But... Norman is...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0002
rows.name:
...Ugh.
I'm fine, I'm fine...
Let's just keep going...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0003
rows.name:
What're you saying?!
With those wounds? We should
go back to town and...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0004
rows.name:
What are YOU saying?
We can't go back...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0005
rows.name: B-but...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0006
rows.name:
...I guess asking you guys
is our best shot.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0007
rows.name:
The thing is, we... Our marriage
has met with some opposition.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0008
rows.name:
Our only option was to elope, so we
headed out to Umon's Shipyard...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0009
rows.name:
We thought if we could rent a boat,
we could leave Gula behind...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0010
rows.name:
In the past, Superbia very nearly
eradicated Riana's ancestral clan.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0011
rows.name:
That's why my dad hates all
Superbians with a fiery passion.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0012
rows.name:
Not that Norman, or most Superbians
for that matter, had anything to do with
that atrocity...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0013
rows.name:
And we love each other!
Why would he deny our beautiful love?

rows.label: qst000502_msg0014
rows.name:
I can see where Riana's parents
are coming from, but- Urk...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0015
rows.name:
Norman! Norman!
Please, stay with us!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0016
rows.name: Please! You have to help him!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0017
rows.name: Oh, thank you!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0018
rows.name:
First, could you gather some
Shepherd's Purses and Dawn
Hydrangeas?

rows.label: qst000502_msg0019
rows.name:
You'll find an apothecary called Nils in
Torigo. He'll make us a medicine...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0020
rows.name:
Nils, he's...my brother. He knows
about our plan, so he should be
happy to help...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0021
rows.name:
I'll try to keep Norman stable,
but please, hurry!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0022
rows.name: S-sorry to put you out like this...
